name: Rob and Bob: Space Station³
description:
Welcome to the Space Station

Reality is falling apart! Rob and Bob must get to work!

Sent up to one of earth's satellites, Rob and Bob have been tasked by the president to merge with one another as that's the theme of the game jam.

Control Rob AND Bob as they navigate their way around the outside of the space staiton clinging on for dear life. The clock is ticking and they must get together so they can merge (because that's the theme of the game jam)

Programming/Game Design: Bradley Jones

UI Art/2D Art/Level Design: Ruben Gardiner

Music/SFX: Nematic Fifth Music
